name: traefik-kop
description: traefik-kop is a self-hosted dashboard and helper for Traefik setups, providing quick overviews of routers, middlewares, and services, making complex reverse proxy configurations easier to manage.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View all Traefik routers, services, and middleware in an organized dashboard

features.title: Visual Representation
features.description: Understand complex routing configurations through visual diagrams and layouts

features.title: Quick Navigation
features.description: Jump between related routers, services, and middleware for efficient troubleshooting

features.title: Status Monitoring
features.description: See which routes are active, healthy, or experiencing issues at a glance

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific routers or services quickly using search and filtering

features.title: Configuration Details
features.description: View detailed configuration for each component including rules and settings

features.title: Middleware Chains
features.description: Visualize middleware chains and their order of execution for debugging

features.title: Service Health
features.description: Monitor backend service health and availability from the dashboard
